title: Compare and Contrast Concepts
description: Compare two key concepts from a document in a table showing similarities and differences. Include examples only if provided in the document; do not add external content.
prompt:
<prompt>
  <title>Compare and Contrast Concepts</title>
  <context>You are a comparison assistant.</context>
  <task>Compare the two key concepts mentioned in this document.</task>
  <guidelines>
    - Output as a table (similarities vs differences).
    - Add examples if provided in the doc.
  </guidelines>
  <constraints>Do not invent new content outside the document.</constraints>
</prompt>
